mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_store_channel A LEFT JOIN bas_store_room B ON A.room_no=B.room_no WHERE A.line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bas_store_channel A LEFT JOIN bas_store_room B ON A.store_no=B.store_no AND A.zone_no=B.zone_no AND A.room_no=B.room_no WHERE 1=1

FROM bas_store_channel A LEFT JOIN bas_store_room B ON A.store_no=B.store_no AND A.zone_no=B.zone_no AND A.room_no=B.room_no WHERE 1=1
